CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 6, 1969, pg. 1, reads: "FIRED AND RE-HIRED - Shown are Gene Doss, Ray Williams, and Roosevelt Roberts, three of the five workers suspended at Presbyterian University Hospital, for wearing Local 1199 buttons on the job. They were later re-hired after a two hour sit-in by fellow unionized employees. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Five workers from the Presbyterian University Hospital wearing uniforms and paper hats, including Eugene Doss, Ray Williams, and Roosevelt Roberts, after their union, 1199 RWDSU Drug and Hospital Workers Local, was recognized
